item.title: Using Tikz
item.description: TikZ picture TikZ picture Here is a TikZ picutre \begin{tikzpicture} \draw (0,0) circle (2cm); \end{tikzpicture} Here is another TikZ picutre \begin{tikzpicture} \begin{axis}[xmax=9,ymax=9, samples=50] \addplot[blue, ultra thick] (x,xx); \addplot[red, ultra thick] (xx,x); \end{axis} \end{tikzpicture}
